desc: Vari Eyewear offers a variety of affordable eyeglasses and sunglasses for men and women. Stylish and comfortable to wear. Visit your nearest eyewear store now.

layout.text: Show stopping Comfort and Eye-catching Savings On Your First Pair of Väri’s
WE KNOW THAT COMFORT IS IMPORTANT TO YOU BUT SO IS SAVING MONEY, SO TO HELP GET YOU INTO YOUR FIRST PAIR OF VÄRI FRAMES WE'RE OFFERING YOU $25 OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER. USE PROMO CODE: GETCOMFORT
